title: "'Connection with the past': AI to find and preserve Europe's historical smells"
excerpt: "There's no sense quite like smell to trigger an emotional response. One whiff of a damp basement, a dusty blanket, a ripe strawberry, or a steaming bowl of pasta can instantly evoke feelings and memories that have their roots in the distant past."
